*remember, you can chat with friends anytime over at the
http://www.shinsengumimb.com...please don't feel as if you have to
wait for these "official" ones

[Sunday June 27, 2004]
New York 5:00 pm	
Los Angeles 2:00pm
Chicago 4:00 pm	
Sao Paulo/Buenos Aires 6:00 pm
As a courtesy to our patient friends in Japan, Tokyo (Monday 6:00 am) -_-

I chose this date because we had a recent string of good topics and
otherwise we would have to wait at least a couple more weeks for a
chat because I know that on the 4th of July you all are planning
crossover patriotic Shinsengumi themed barbeques

*I am ~aware~ that a certain character portrayed by someone's favorite
actor will be assasinated this week or next week on NHK Shinsengumi! 
If this is the case we will have to push back the time (that being
said I will miss 60 min. of the chat and [not] be able to maintain a
transcript...so someone has to take up this task ^_^

Possible Topics to discuss (based on topic popularity):
Shinsengumi Grandpas ("Don't Mess With Miki" & Nagakura at the Movies)
Nagakura + Saitou after the Restoration 
(The Absence of Saitou's name on the Cenotaph and its implications)
Saitou's words 
Shinsengumi Spirits?
[More] Shinsengumi Stories?
---------------------------------------------
recalling momoiro's words on the fear of having your soul sucked in by
the camera...
Tokio to Hajime/Goro "Anata, I have set up an appointment for a family
portrait I already had your uniformed dry cleaned and---"
Hajime/Goro "Woman?! Are you planning to kill me?"
Tokio in chibi mode [sweatdrop]
